sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Saving faith set forth in three dialogues or Conferences: 1 2 3 between Christ and a publican. Pharisee. Doubting beleever. Whereunto is added tvvo sermons one of them preached before the Parliament the other before the Lord Mayor of the City of London. By Vavasor Powell, minister of the Gospell. Powell, Vavasor, 1617-1670.
[12], 59 [i.e. 61], [1] p.
Printed by Robert Ibbitson for Livewell Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-head Alley, London : 1651.
Signatures: pi² A⁴ a-c P (-P8). Intended to be bound before "Christ exalted above all creatures" (Wing, 2nd ed., P3081), which has a separate dated title page and separate register and pagination. The words "between Christ and a" and "publican . beleever" are each bracketed together on title page. Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 2.". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Saving faith set forth in three dialogues or Conferences: 1 2 3 between Christ and a publican. Pharisee. Doubting beleever. Whereunto is added tvvo sermons one of them preached before the Parliament the other before the Lord Mayor of the City of London. By Vavasor Powell, minister of the Gospell. Powell, Vavasor, 1617-1670.
[12], 59 [i.e. 61], [1] p.
Printed by Robert Ibbitson for Livewell Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-head Alley, London : 1651.
Signatures: pi² A⁴ a-c P (-P8). Intended to be bound before "Christ exalted above all creatures" (Wing, 2nd ed., P3081), which has a separate dated title page and separate register and pagination. The words "between Christ and a" and "publican . beleever" are each bracketed together on title page. Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 2.". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Livewell Chapman
Robert Ibbitson
the Crown in Popes-head Alley
